amendment.description: To urge the President to release information regarding sources of foreign support for the 9-11 hijackers.

action.text: Amendment SA 1994 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1994.

Amendment SA 1994 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S13349-13352; text: CR S13350) To urge the President to release information regarding sources of foreign support for the 9-11 hijackers.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1994 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
